title: Homarid
text: Homarid enters the battlefield with a tide counter on it.At the beginning of your upkeep, put a tide counter on Homarid.As long as there is exactly one tide counter on Homarid, it gets -1/-1.As long as there are exactly three tide counters on Homarid, it gets +1/+1.Whenever there are four or more tide counters on Homarid, remove all tide counters from it.
